Articles.Content:
I'm returning to the community! In celebration, I wrote a short comical piece for you.

This took about two hours (The art, not the writing! Sheesh.), and I would have made it into a proper sequence, with more than one panel and good pacing, but I realized I don't yet have the luxury of time or skill to do that.

Anyone (Cap'n Skunky? You still run that comic? ) may use the text attached to this to make a well-paced comic strip. Of course, if you're gonna use it I humbly request you give credit where credit is due... and that you go to the effort of either PMing me for the text or transcribing it from the comic yourself.

I love you guys.
Ha, I love it. You should do more!
Yay you're back! I loved your previous art with the Kraken and the Mainsail.

Happy to see you missed me.

If inspiration strikes, the art will flow - just give it a little time, I suppose.

Man, it's good to be back!
